effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.sun_moon: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.
